Chapter 1 - Speech Recognition Manager / Speech Recognition Manager Reference
Speech Recognition Manager Routines

Creating and Manipulating Recognizers

The Speech Recognition Manager provides routines that you can use to create and manage recognizers.

Note
See "Recognizer Properties" on page 1-40 for a description of the available recognizer properties.
